name: Music Library & Player
short_description:
Music Library & Player utilizes PHP to deliver your web-accessible music library via JWPlayer, the web's most popular HTML5/Flash web player, in a fully responsive and modern Bootstrap interface. 

The library does not require a database back-end. It parses the directory structure, best suited for [ROOT]/[ARTIST]/[ALBUM]/[TRACKS] type of layout. This isn't required, but makes for the best user experience.

The code contained in this script has not been minified. It is written in long form and is well-documented for ease of use and customization. 

Individual tracks are presented with download links. Minimal effort has been put into limiting the reach of the player and download links. It is limited, by default, to the six audio file types that are supported by JWPlayer v6. It is advised that you password protect the Music Library & Player directory using htaccess or other method to restrict public access.
summary: Easily access your music collection from any device, anywhere.
